title: MILFORMER: Weighted Dual Stream Class Centered Random Attention Multiple Instance Learning For Whole Slide Image Classification
details: H Jafarinia, D Hamdi, A Alipanah, N Mirzaie… - AI for Health Equity and …, 2024
abstract: Abstract Whole Slide Imaging (WSI) in contemporary pathology is pivotal, particularly in cancer diagnosis and prognosis. Multiple Instance Learning (MIL) has emerged as a pivotal strategy to address the scarcity of localized annotations in WSI analysis …
